text: I'm strongly for a patient Bill of Rights. Decisions ought to be made by doctors, not accountants.
author: Charles Schumer

text: I'm by no means condemning prescription medicine for mental health. I've seen it save a lot of people's lives.
author: Zach Braff

text: Mammograms are really sort of a gift. You can either catch something early or count your lucky stars because nothing was discovered. Either way, you're ahead of the game.
author: Charlotte Ross

text: If you look at the human condition today, not everyone is well fed, has access to good medical care, or the physical basics that provide for a healthy and a happy life.
author: Ralph Merkle

text: Passion, you see, can be destroyed by a doctor. It cannot be created.
author: Peter Shaffer
